document.full_text: two people were killed on friday and at least 90 injured across the ugandan capital as police fired bullets and teargas at crowds protesting against the arrest of an opposition leader.
document.title: two killed, scores hospitalized in uganda riots
lines_and_colors: two people were killed on friday and at least 90 injured across the ugandan capital as police fired bullets and teargas at crowds protesting against the arrest of an opposition leader.
